professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in designing databases, creating SQL & PL/SQL scripts, and managing database environments. Skilled in various tools and software, with a strong background in customer service and analytics.

access methods

importing
deleting

etc.

Created SQL & PL/SQL scripts for development needs.
